title: recursion_02 and recursion_03 hang with gfortran on macOS
body:
I had to disable these two tests in #834 because they hang on macOS M1 max with gfortran installed using spack.

GFortran details:
```console
$ gfortran -v
Reading specs from /Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/gcc-11.3.0-wiug7nsdvmtmlzc5whzmrv6enfmxhjt4/lib/gcc/aarch64-apple-darwin21.3.0/11.3.0/specs
COLLECT_GCC=gfortran
COLLECT_LTO_WRAPPER=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/gcc-11.3.0-wiug7nsdvmtmlzc5whzmrv6enfmxhjt4/libexec/gcc/aarch64-apple-darwin21.3.0/11.3.0/lto-wrapper
Target: aarch64-apple-darwin21.3.0
Configured with: /var/folders/8w/5mqfkhqn1nj0tw97g3hl1nyh0000gn/T/ondrej/spack-stage/spack-stage-gcc-11.3.0-wiug7nsdvmtmlzc5whzmrv6enfmxhjt4/spack-src/configure --prefix=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/gcc-11.3.0-wiug7nsdvmtmlzc5whzmrv6enfmxhjt4 --with-pkgversion='Spack GCC' --with-bugurl=https://github.com/spack/spack/issues --disable-multilib --enable-languages=c,c++,fortran --disable-nls --disable-canonical-system-headers --with-system-zlib --with-zstd-include=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/zstd-1.5.2-dxbaafbkwk4qy5yhq2tu3rwzz7xlxsso/include --with-zstd-lib=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/zstd-1.5.2-dxbaafbkwk4qy5yhq2tu3rwzz7xlxsso/lib --disable-bootstrap --with-mpfr-include=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/mpfr-4.1.0-jk2wmlzcxooad5ynizeqyw4hb5ov2tgg/include --with-mpfr-lib=/Users/ondrej/repos/spack/opt/spack/darwin-monterey-m1/apple-clang-13.0.0/mpfr-4.1.0-jk2wmlzcxooad5ynizeqyw4hb5ov2tgg/lib --with-sysroot=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk
```
